item.title: Masayoshi Yamazaki
item.description: Masayoshi Yamazaki is a Japanese singer-songwriter who plays guitar-driven blues, rock, and pop music, though he has also recorded piano ballads. Though he primarily plays the guitar, he has played the drums, piano, percussion, saxophone, and glockenspiel on some albums.

item.title: Masaharu Fukuyama
item.description: Masaharu Fukuyama is a Japanese musician, singer-songwriter, multi-instrumentalist and actor from Nagasaki. He debuted in 1990 with the single 'Tsuioku no Ame no Naka'.
